toolRouting.comment: Tool routing configuration for Claude endpoints

strategies.builtin-first: Try builtin first, fallback to DTG
strategies.dtg-first: Try DTG first, fallback to builtin
strategies.llm-passthrough: Don't intercept, let LLM handle it

notes: exit_plan_mode and task are ClaudeCode-specific and should always use builtin
File system tools (glob, grep, ls) can be overridden by DTG versions if needed
Use '*' to set default behavior for unlisted tools
